Text: are you therensf Hey I cant find my ski stuff black columbia ski pants and my purple goggles The last time I used them was when we were living together I was just wondering if they may have gotten mixed up with your stuff Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x

RE Yonsf Yup hes and SO big now Hes talking like crazy and says the funniest shit Hes getting to be pretty ornery though Go figure Original Message From mailto Sent Friday February AM To Subject RE Yo Not much here I have to work Saturday and Sunday dayshifts which kind of sucks however I am usually ok to go out until like on nights like that as Saturdays are not too busy Is Bailey now

RE Yonsf Hi Not much Only plans are for Sunday Bailys birthday was yesterday and were celebrating it Sunday afternoon What about you Original Message From mailto Sent Friday February AM To Subject Yo Just bored and writting to say hi What do you have going on this weekend

yonsf Whats up Im so curious to hear about all your crazy adventures in Vegas this weekend Did your sister go with you guys Thanks for the message the other night morning whenever it was that was really sweet Not sure if you remember leaving it or not Regardless I miss you too We have to get together soon Did I tell you that Im going to Vegas in April Im excited I had a thought I was thinking that a real man such as yourself deserves and needs a much bigger tv then what you have I mean really I think that you should sell the tv back to me for or free if youre feeling generous and buy yourself a much bigger more manly or inch tv What do you think Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x
nsf Whats up How was your weekend Called you on Saturday night around but got your voice mail Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x
nsf did I not responde to something I was supposed to Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x
RE what doingnsf Hi Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Subject RE what doing Herro

RE what doingnsf I would love to do that And like I said I realized I have every right to go out with a friend girl or boy if I want to If he wants to be insecure then thats his problem Does your offer still stand If so when Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Subject RE what doing Yeah tell me about it So the reason I called to see if you wanted to do something last week was because I got a settlement on my some of my dads insurance shit and I wanted to go out to a nice dinner I thought it would be a nice opportunity for us to hang out and catch up I hope you dont still think that I didnt want to see you that night because you are dating dave I just had to run some errands right when you called back

RE what doingnsf Im ok Coming down with a cold so I feel like shit Found out I got accepted to these apartments I wanted which is cool Im just a little stressed because move in costs are always a bitch Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Subject RE what doing Never mind So anyway I am totally worked right now I went to the Blazer game with my friend Kate and we ended up going out afterward i ended up staying out until am and I had to be in to work at So basically my day is totally sucking How are you doing
RE what doingnsf whats that supposed to mean Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Subject Re what doing ya dont say
what doingnsf Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x

RE Hinsf Ive emailed you since then I thought Of course Im talking to you How was New Years What did you do Mine was good Jesse and Matt just had a party It was pretty chill about or more It was a good crowd and then we went over to this little bar across the street from them until about or so I dont remember Original Message From mailto Sent Friday January AM To Subject Hi So are you not talking to me anymore or something I emailed once and called twice in the past week and a half and havent heard back from you

Hinsf Hey Havent talked to you in a while How have you been Are you done with all your Christmas shopping or are you going to do it all in LA How was Burnsy and San Francisco Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x

REnsf Mmmmmm stuffed mushrooms Original Message From mailto Sent Monday December AM To Subject Okay so five hours at work and so far no fallout from christmas party shenanigans This is going better that expected

Christmas Cocktail Partynsf Hey guys Im sorry this is such short notice Actually my roommate just threw it on me this morning that we were having the party this soon I obviously was not able to send this to everyone I would like to invite so feel free to spread the word Regardless here are the details Its a cocktail party so the attire is business casual to semi formal The date is Saturday December nd Entertainment will once again be provided by the band th Ave Instinct I will be collecting suggestions for a new name for the band Start showing up around pm Thats close to when the band will start Were thinking more along the lines of an acoustic session this time in an effort to avoid any Grinchs aka Pigs No cover Were just asking that everyone bring a bottle of their own boos Well provide the mixers and some boos of our own Here is our address and directions for those of you who did not make it to the last party SW Vacuna St Portland Ph If youre coming from Portland go South on Barbur Blvd towards Tigard Turn Left on to Capital Hwy Go up less then of a mile Capital Hwy turns into th St and see on right hand side Our street is or streets after on the left Turn Left on to Vacuna St If you get to PCC Sylvania youve gone too far Our place is the th house on the right side Id love to see all of you there Were hoping for a turnout like our last party so again feel welcome to bring whoever See you then if not sooner Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x

you win Cc I guess congradulations are in order on your Beavs That was a sorry ass performance by Oregon I was totally dissapointed I watched it with Mom and Kurt and they were both routing for Oregon State But then I told them that Oregon State couldnt take us to the Rose Bowl so they better start routing for Oregon So Kurt did Hes such a push over No I think he just felt sorry for me I guess Im not going down there for the rose bowl and New Years then So when you get back give me a call and well set up our little date at Beaches Have a great Thanksgiving with your family and give them all hugs and kisses from me Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x

nsf Dont ever be sorry for venting to me I feel privileged that you trust me that much as a friend and god knows Ive cried to you a hundred times about stuff You are so right about the fact that you had a way better relationship with your Dad then most guys do I mean look at my brother and my Dad Jesse doesnt even call him Dad Why in the world would your Mom and Angela freak out on you for having human feelings I dont get it And besides all that you were the one who used to help me and basically write all that stuff for me so YOU CAN DO IT Tootie is doing good She went in on Monday to find out if the tumor was operable and found out that it is buried so deep in her brain that if they even attempted to operate on it it would probably paralyze her whole left side So she goes in on Tuesday to Emanuel hospital for this high voltage radiation treatment thats supposed to zap the shit out of the tumor Then theyll check it in four months to see if its shrunk If not I guess they will continue with the regular radiation treatments I talked to her on Tuesday and she seems in really good spirits Im looking forward to seeing her on Thanksgiving What are you doing for Thanksgiving Are you going home What are you doing for the Civil War game If youre not going to Corvallis do you want to watch it together somewhere I hope you dont have to work this weekend We should have dinner too Beaches Ive been craving their stuffed mushrooms and I havent been there since the last time you and I went Write me back Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Dpt x

RE YOnsf I miss Jay Brown I wish I could have seen him the last time I was up there Well hopefully for the Rose Bowl But thats also New Years By the way why do we always call him Jay Brown Why not just Jay Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Subject RE YO As Jay Brown says shit I dont even have any money to eat

RE YOnsf Can you take a rain check on that I am so broke right now I had to borrow money from my Mom just to put gas in my car I have food at home so Ill just be packing lunches until the th Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Subject YO Yo are we doin lunch tommorow still

RE FW Whats upnsf So did I Ever since he left Wilshire year ago whenever we talk he tells me how much he could really use me down there and how I could make a lot of money working for him You remember But when we talked seriously yesterday afternoon he said that was when he was going to start outsourcing and doing REOs But they couldnt get the staff to handle it so they decided not to They are in the process of talking about it again and if they do decide to go in that direction they will deffinately need me Whatever it sounded like he was just talking out of his ass But I do believe he could help me out should I decide to make the move Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject RE FW Whats up So i have a question If Danny has been constantly asking you to come work for him how come he is now trying to get you a job somewhere else I thought he wanted you to work for him

RE FW Whats upnsf Cool Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject RE FW Whats up I think Bruce Zechenelly used to work for Advanta If you get an interview their I can call him and ask him how they are as a company

RE FW Whats upnsf Yeah its a long story but basically he doesnt have a solid offer for me But he has connections with some REO directors of some good companies like Advanta and he said he would give me great recommendations He has already given my name and his recommendations to the REO director of Advanta and I guess that guy wants to talk to me Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject RE FW Whats up The fact that you are moving down there has nothing to do with whether or not I do I was just joking Stop be so over analytical Did you talk to Danny about the offer

RE FW Whats upnsf Why is the fact that Im moving down there making you you lean towards staying up here Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject RE FW Whats up I dont know for sure if I am I am just in the seriously thinking about it stages However the fact that you are moving down there is definetly making me lean toward staying up here Tell your mom if you move and I stay she can adopt me

RE FW Whats upnsf Youre just saying that because you dont want me to move down there now that youre moving back there Thats ok I understand Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject Re FW Whats up Your mom rocks

FW Whats upnsf Check out this email I got from my Mom Classic Shes still hopeful Original Message From Sue Westerfield mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject Whats up Whats the haps Sorry I didnt get to talk to you much the other night Mom always has me going in several different directions and its hard to chat You just need to come over to the house more Angela and I were talking yesterday and we decided that you cant go to LA Ang is planning on moving back here and she doesnt want you to move I dont either Its hard enough that I have one kid far away And LA is a HARD place to live without friends already being there Now if you and Mark were together and both of you moved there that would be easier for me to take

REnsf Angela can be so judgmental and jelous so that doesnt surprise me Cant wait to hear the story Ill talk to you later Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject RE I assume when you say sick you were refering to Angelas friend If so then no I didnt even touch her Angela actuall hates Nicole she says she is a fat ho I have a very good story to tell you about what happened

REnsf SICK Im assuming you didnt mess around with that too much Well if Nicole comes up I would love to go out with you guys Shes so great Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject RE No come to find out Angelas little friend had herpes YUCK But actually you know her It is Nicole The girl that Jay was dating for a while Jay didnt care but it caused a huge fight between Angela and I It was pretty messy

REnsf That will be so nice if Angela could come up Thats awesome about this new girl Its not Angelas little friend is it Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject RE I feel bad but she understands I think she might come up and be with me for thanksgiving I have a six day break right around then and I think it would be good for her to just get away for a while Guess what I had a couple of dates while I was in LA They went very well and she might come up in December for a weekend

REnsf Youre so right about the Dave deal Not sure what Im going to do We communicate pretty well so maybe Ill just talk to him about it Thats is so sad about Angela I know you mut be feeling so bad about not being with her but she understands that you cant right now She has got your Mom and Danno and Jay Shell be ok Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject RE Letting him stir is good in some ways but guys actually tend to like a lack of clarity in relationships as it gives them more leeway However I dont really know the dynamic in your relationship at all So Angela and I made up from our huge saturday morning fight before I left on Sunday and she cried like a baby when i left I feel so bad leaving her She is really broken hearted right now

REnsf Not a date date Just somebody to go with me It could have been a girl for all I cared But Im glad I didnt bring anybody The party was lame I didnt invite Dave just to spite him because Im immature like that When we started seeing eachother again the whole seeing other people was left up in the air But it was made clear that neither of us would like it if we found out the other person was dating someone else And we could not sleep with anybody else by any means But its become more strict and very evident that neither of us even want to see anybody else I just have my guard up right now So even though we are basically back together I dont want to make it official Im still letting him stir Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject RE How come you wanted a date for halloween then

REnsf I mentioned it to my family last night but nobody took me seriously Im not sure what kind of position andor how much they would offer me Right now Im only making K a year and to live in CA I would think I would need to make at LEAST K a year to meet the cost of living etc I would also ask for a signing bonus to go towards moving costs I am very serious about moving there But it all depends on how good his offer is and what kind of position it is I dont know where I would live Their office is in Beverly Hills and I know I couldnt afford to live there What do you think As far as time frame Im thinking February That would allow me to get through the Hollidays and break my lease Im not sure what Daves reaction would be Things have been going really good lately and hes been opening himself up a lot more towards me For example he wont tell me he loves me and thats fine But the other night when he thought I was sleeping he kissed me on the forehead and whispered it to me Yeah So again I dont know Im sure hell be dissapointed but I think he will understand Hes not the type to say No dont go I love you and I want you to stay Even if it was how he felt What about you When do you think youll make your move Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject RE So you are really serious about this then huh I thought you were just thinking about it So where were you thinking of living Have you discussed it with your family How much would they have to offer you in order for you to move and what kind of time frame are you thinking about What do you think daves reaction will be

REnsf No problem Thats what friends are for Im sorry you are so tired Im wide awake and ansy to hear from Danny to see what kind of an offer he can make me I want to move away now Im curious to see how old Dave is going to handle it when I tell him Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject Just wanted to thank you for your help with my pay check last week it was greatly appreciated I am so tired I didnt get to bed until am last night and had to be here at YUCK
REnsf you betcha baby Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October AM To Subject hey can you pick me up at my house instead of work I would rather not leave my car at work all weekend
RE Hellonsf call me at work x Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October AM To Subject RE Hello the problem is that I need to go at noon
RE FW hinsf whatever Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi You love it when I pick on you
RE FW hinsf shut up Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi I am not to picky I dated you didnt I
RE FW hinsf His loss Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi Thats a dilema

RE FW hinsf I am Hes just not madly in love with me Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi Yeah I guess that makes sense I thought you were madly in love with this cat
RE FW hinsf oh how generous of you Youre too picky Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi Dude that is psycho But i will still give her a break because she was cute

RE FW hinsf Were fine Ive been getting a lot of crap to dump him and move on cause hes obviously not the one but Im just like thats stupid cause Im not looking for the one right now so why not just hang out with him in the mean time Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi So how are you and what his face doing

RE FW hinsf Thats not psycho She just liked you Give her a break Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject RE FW hi So I went out with a bunch of dudes from work last night Me and my buddy Bill met these two chicks at the Saucebox and one of them asked for my number So I pick up my cell phone this morning and theres a message The chick called me last night The night I freaking met her HELLO PSYCHO

RE FW hinsf I dont know I guess Zack has never been to an apartment before and he thought that it looked like a Hotel Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Subject Re FW hi So what is this living in a hotel shit

FW hinsf If you cant tell Im trying to get you to come back at me I hope you dont think Im being serious Original Message From Katie Trullinger Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject RE hi Why would you need to come back Youre the one always ripping on your friends for never wanting to hang out with any chicks I wasnt meaning that towards you But if you feel like making some sort of weak ass attempt at making fun because you still think Im a freekin lesbian then go right ahead Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject RE hi I thought of a great comeback for that one but since I havent heard from you in a while I am going to be nice

RE hinsf Why would you need to come back Youre the one always ripping on your friends for never wanting to hang out with any chicks I wasnt meaning that towards you But if you feel like making some sort of weak ass attempt at making fun because you still think Im a freekin lesbian then go right ahead Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject RE hi I thought of a great comeback for that one but since I havent heard from you in a while I am going to be nice

RE hinsf That is weird I never see any of your friends Except for that time I saw Julie and Marcus I suppose thats because I hang out at places where theres girls and your friends are afraid of girls Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject RE hi Did I tell you I saw Kathy Chaney at Cobalt Lounge about weeks ago and then the next day i was that Prisilla sp at Scooters I just thought it was wierd seeing two of your friends on two succesive evenings

RE hinsf What do you mean and me I just went off on me Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject RE hi Things are good I have been very busy Work is going really well Other than that not much really And you

RE hinsf Thats so cool that your sister finally came up What did she think of Portland in general How are her and Jay doing Ive been pretty good Keeping busy with work babysitting what not Im house sitting for my boss David Ho this whole week and watching his year old son Zack I take Zack to school in the mornings and pick him up after work and then we just hang for the rest of the evening Hes really a cool kid Very disciplined But I dont think he gets much attention from his parents and I dont think they let him be a kid very much So Ive been spoiling him We go out to dinner and I let him order whatever he wants I tought him how to play poker last night and we made brownies and he acted as if it was the coolest most exciting thing hes ever done He kept saying Were having fun This is FUN As if having fun and being a kid was some weird concept Tonight were going to a baseball game and hes stoked about that cause his parents dont let him play sports I took him to my apartment yesterday and he asked my why I lived in a hotel I should have told him Cause your Daddy doesnt pay me enough but I guess that would have been bad Jesses band played this last weekend at the Old Market Pub Mom and Kurt came and my Dad came too My Dad ran the sound board and he was so stoked He was so excited that Jesse wanted to involve him like that Mom Kurt just got back from visiting my sister in Amsterdam They took a road trip to Paris and my Mom broke her foot while they were there so they had to see Paris from the car Shes wearing a huge purple cast But shes ok Shes got a little cast shoe so that she can walk on it without crutches We got all fucked up when the band played and she was dancing all night on it I guess thats it Looking forward to the nice weather I love Portland in the Spring and Summer it puts me in the best mood Going down to LA in July for business If you happen to be there by chance well have to party Dont worry no Kristen Are things going well with you Hows work Hows life in general Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject Re hi Hey sorry I didnt write you back sooner however I had a six day break Anyway ST Pattys day was a blast Dahl and Pat and I started drinking around am and by the time the night was over we had been to different bars got kicked out of two met up with a ton of people and had an overall blast I was so hating it the next day My sister was up from LA this weekend We had a really good time Went to Touche and the Gypsy on Thursday went to the Blazer game and then Scooters On Saturday night we went to the Kennedy School and on Sunday we went to Multnomah Falls and took her to Beaches for lunch She had a really good time and it was nice to have her up for the weekend Anyway how is everything with you
hinsf How are you I havnt talked to you in a while since just before St Pattys day Did you survive Katie Trullinger Wilshire Credit Corporation REO Marketing Manager x
